con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableService" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wns="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableService" xmlns:tsn="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableSchema"> <!--TYPES BLOCK--> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTable/" xmlns:tps="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTable" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import schemaLocation="TypesForTT.xsd" namespace="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTable"/> <xsd:element name="operationResultResponse" type="xs:string"/> <xsd:element name="addTripRequest" type="tps:trip"/> <xsd:element name="editTrnDestRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="trnID" type="tps:vehicleID"/> <xsd:element name="newDestination" type="tps:station"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="addBusRequest" type="tps:trip"/> <xsd:element name="deleteBusRequest" type="tps:vehicleID"/> <xsd:element name="getTrnByDestRequest" type="tps:station"/> <xsd:element name="getTrnByDestResponse" type="tps:trip"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--MESSAGE DEFINITIONS--> <wsdl:message name="addTripRequestMsg"> <wsdl:part name="addTripInputPart" element="tsn:addTripRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addTripResponseMsg"> <wsdl:part name="addTripOutputPart" element="tsn:operationResultResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="editTrnDestRequestMsg"> <wsdl:part name="editTrnDestInputPart" element="tsn:editTrnDestRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="editTrnDestResponseMsg"> <wsdl:part name="editTrnDestinationOutputPart" element="tsn:operationResultResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addBusRequestMsg"> <wsdl:part name="addBusInputPart" element="tsn:addBusRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addBusResponseMsg"> <wsdl:part name="addBusOutputPart" element="tsn:operationResultResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deleteBusRequestMsg"> <wsdl:part name="deleteBusInputPart" element="tsn:deleteBusRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deleteBusResponseMsg"> <wsdl:part name="deleteBusOutputPart" element="tsn:operationResultResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getTrnListByDestRequestMsg"> <wsdl:part name="getTrnByDestInputPart" element="tsn:getTrnByDestRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getTrnListByDestResponseMsg"> <wsdl:part name="getTrnByDestOutputPart" element="tsn:getTrnByDestResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <!--PORTTYPE BLOCK--> <wsdl:portType name="timeTablePortType"> <wsdl:operation name="addTrip"> <wsdl:input name="addTripInput" message="wns:addTripRequestMsg"/> <wsdl:output name="addTripOutput" message="wns:addTripResponseMsg"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="editTrainDestination"> <wsdl:input name="editTrnDestInput" message="wns:editTrnDestRequestMsg"/> <wsdl:output name="editTrnDestOutput" message="wns:editTrnDestResponseMsg"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="addBus"> <wsdl:input name="addBusInput" message="wns:addBusRequestMsg"/> <wsdl:output name="addBusOutput" message="wns:addBusResponseMsg"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deleteBus"> <wsdl:input name="deleteBusInput" message="wns:deleteBusRequestMsg"/> <wsdl:output name="deleteBusOutput" message="wns:deleteBusResponseMsg"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getTrainListByDestination"> <wsdl:input name="getTrnListByDestInput" message="wns:getTrnListByDestRequestMsg"/> <wsdl:output name="getTrnListByDestOutput" message="wns:getTrnListByDestResponseMsg"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <!--BINDING BLOCK--> <wsdl:binding name="timeTableBinding" type="wns:timeTablePortType"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <wsdl:operation name="addTrip"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableService/addTrip"/> <wsdl:input name="addTripInput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="addTripOutput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="editTrainDestination"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableService/editTrainDestination"/> <wsdl:input name="editTrnDestInput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="editTrnDestOutput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="addBus"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableService/addBus"/> <wsdl:input name="addBusInput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="addBusOutput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deleteBus"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableService/deleteBus"/> <wsdl:input name="deleteBusInput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="deleteBusOutput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getTrainListByDestination"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableService/getTrainByDestination"/> <wsdl:input name="getTrnListByDestInput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getTrnListByDestOutput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <!--SERVICE BLOCK--> <wsdl:service name="timeTableService"> <wsdl:port name="timeTableService-soap11" binding="wns:timeTableBinding"> <soap:address location="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTable" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTable"> <xs:import schemaLocation="http://www.codesynthesis.com/projects/xsstl/xsstl/iso3166-country-code.xsd" namespace="http://www.codesynthesis.com/xmlns/xsstl"/> <xs:complexType name="trip"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="vehicleID" type="tns:vehicleID"/> <xs:element name="depStation" type="tns:station"/> <xs:element name="destStation" type="tns:station"/> <xs:element name="timeInWay"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(0[0-9]|1[0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="tripType" use="required" type="tns:tripType"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="vehicleID"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="7"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:pattern value="(trn|bus).{4,7}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="station"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="countryCode" type="ISO3166CountyCode" xmlns="http://www.codesynthesis.com/xmlns/xsstl"/> <xs:element name="city"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="2"/> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="timeZone"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="GMT((-|\+)\d{1,2})?"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="tripType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="TRAIN"/> <xs:enumeration value="BUS"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.codesynthesis.com/xmlns/xsstl" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:stl="http://www.codesynthesis.com/xmlns/xsstl"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright (C) 2006-2007 Code Synthesis Tools CC
Redistribution and use with or without modification are permitted under the terms of the new BSD license. See the accompanying LICENSE file.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType name="ISO3166CountyCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Two-letter (alpha-2) ISO 3166-1 code for one of the 243 countries.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="AF"/> <!--AFGHANISTAN--> <xsd:enumeration value="AX"/> <!--ÅLAND ISLANDS--> <xsd:enumeration value="AL"/> <!--ALBANIA--> <xsd:enumeration value="DZ"/> <!--ALGERIA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AS"/> <!--AMERICAN SAMOA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AD"/> <!--ANDORRA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AO"/> <!--ANGOLA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AI"/> <!--ANGUILLA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AQ"/> <!--ANTARCTICA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AG"/> <!--ANTIGUA AND BARBUDA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AR"/> <!--ARGENTINA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AM"/> <!--ARMENIA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AW"/> <!--ARUBA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AU"/> <!--AUSTRALIA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AT"/> <!--AUSTRIA--> <xsd:enumeration value="AZ"/> <!--AZERBAIJAN--> <xsd:enumeration value="BS"/> <!--BAHAMAS--> <xsd:enumeration value="BH"/> <!--BAHRAIN--> <xsd:enumeration value="BD"/> <!--BANGLADESH--> <xsd:enumeration value="BB"/> <!--BARBADOS--> <xsd:enumeration value="BY"/> <!--BELARUS--> <xsd:enumeration value="BE"/> <!--BELGIUM--> <xsd:enumeration value="BZ"/> <!--BELIZE--> <xsd:enumeration value="BJ"/> <!--BENIN--> <xsd:enumeration value="BM"/> <!--BERMUDA--> <xsd:enumeration value="BT"/> <!--BHUTAN--> <xsd:enumeration value="BO"/> <!--BOLIVIA--> <xsd:enumeration value="BA"/> <!--BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA--> <xsd:enumeration value="BW"/> <!--BOTSWANA--> <xsd:enumeration value="BV"/> <!--BOUVET ISLAND--> <xsd:enumeration value="BR"/> <!--BRAZIL--> <xsd:enumeration value="IO"/> <!--BRITISH INDIAN OCEAN TERRITORY--> <xsd:enumeration value="BN"/> <!--BRUNEI DARUSSALAM--> <xsd:enumeration value="BG"/> <!--BULGARIA--> <xsd:enumeration value="BF"/> <!--BURKINA FASO--> <xsd:enumeration value="BI"/> <!--BURUNDI--> <xsd:enumeration value="KH"/> <!--CAMBODIA--> <xsd:enumeration value="CM"/> <!--CAMEROON--> <xsd:enumeration value="CA"/> <!--CANADA--> <xsd:enumeration value="CV"/> <!--CAPE VERDE--> <xsd:enumeration value="KY"/> <!--CAYMAN ISLANDS--> <xsd:enumeration value="CF"/> <!--CENTRAL AFRICAN REPUBLIC--> <xsd:enumeration value="TD"/> <!--CHAD--> <xsd:enumeration value="CL"/> <!--CHILE--> <xsd:enumeration value="CN"/> <!--CHINA--> <xsd:enumeration value="CX"/> <!--CHRISTMAS ISLAND--> <xsd:enumeration value="CC"/> <!--COCOS con:response.name: TRAIN
con:response.con:responseContent: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tim="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableSchema"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tim:operationResultResponse>Bus was NOT added: you should use 'BUS' triptype instead of 'TRAIN'!</tim:operationResultResponse> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:response.name: DEFAULT
con:response.con:responseContent: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tim="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableSchema"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tim:operationResultResponse>Bus was NOT added: expected tripType is 'BUS', but was '${tripType}'!</tim:operationResultResponse> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:mockOperation.name: addTripByScript

con:response.name: TooLongTripFailure
con:response.con:responseContent: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Body> <soapenv:Fault> <faultcode>500</faultcode> <faultstring xml:lang="?">Too long trip</faultstring> <detail> Trips longer than 5 hours are not supported, Your trip is ${tripLength} hours long. </detail> </soapenv:Fault> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:response.name: InvalidTrnIDResponse
con:response.con:responseContent: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Body> <soapenv:Fault> <faultcode>401</faultcode> <faultstring xml:lang="?">Invalid vehicle ID</faultstring> <detail> Vehicle ID for train should start from 'trn' and be 8 symbols long </detail> </soapenv:Fault> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:response.name: UnsupportedDestResponse
con:response.con:responseContent: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Body> <soapenv:Fault> <faultcode>401</faultcode> <faultstring xml:lang="?">Invalid destination</faultstring> <detail> Destination country you selected is not supported </detail> </soapenv:Fault> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:query.con:name: ValidTrnID
InvalidVehicleID
InsupportedCountry

con:response.name: SeeLog
con:response.con:responseContent: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tim="http://www.khveras.com/TimeTableSchema"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tim:operationResultResponse>Operation completed with 1 warning. See log for more details.</tim:operationResultResponse> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:response.name: FakeFailResponse
con:response.con:responseContent: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Body> <soapenv:Fault> <faultcode>501</faultcode> <faultstring xml:lang="?">Error obtaining train list</faultstring> <detail> Please, try again in 3 minutes </detail> </soapenv:Fault> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
